channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There is still water leaking, 6th January
item.description:
On the path and grass in front of the houses, 152 Broad Oak Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Caernarvon Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Large pothole on Left had side coming down the hill, 6th January
item.description:
Just after the corner from paynes pitch to chapel hay lane on the left hand side
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chapel Hay Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 6th January
item.description:
Customer reporting that the two sets of temp lights are close enough that the traffic flowing through them gets gridlocked by traffic coming from the opposite directions - no manual control
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Road has a large lump in it following road works, 6th January
item.description:
Where the Roseleigh development on Stoke Road installed the estate entrance the contractors dug a trench across the road. This has been filled in poorly leaving and is raised above the height of the road on both sides but more pronounced on the side travelling towards Bishops Cleeve
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa, 6th January
item.description:
Someone has dumped a single seated sofa here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, St Peters Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
